text: Tune in to channel “TBC” for Jack’s presentation of the radio infrastructure of the summer school!
Broadcasting about pirate radio from the radio mast on the mountain behind topolo
Presentation of the summer school website by Kirsten and Ben in 5 min
Music for Cats - tune in on channel 2 or 98.8 MHz on the FM for some slow sounds to wake up to, the cats are already out and about
On Soundings - tune in on TBC or 98.8 MHz on the FM to hear some snippets of this morning’s workshop
